data.text: @TghatMedia አሁንም ለሰላም እጅ መስጠት ነው።ካልሆነ ጊዜው በረዘመ ቁጥር ችግሩም እየሰፋ መፍትሄም እየጠፋ ነው ሚሄደው።

@TghatMedia Diaspora Tegaru have been trying to find ways to have access/connection 2 Tigray to help our people in whatever capacity, but it is tormenting 2 c z IC unwilling to break z >488 days of #TigraySiege @BradSherman @ChrisCoons @SenatorHick @RepGregoryMeeks @SenateForeign @PowerUSAID
@TghatMedia This is good news. This is also a proof that there is no Tigray genocide or Tigray famine. 👌🏾. #TruthMatters

@TghatMedia People of Tigray have been ethnically cleansed, mass massacred, violently raped. Additionally, their infrastructure, factories, & institutions turned to dust. They were cut off from the rest of the world by systematic siege. #TigrayGenocide #SupportHR6600

@TghatMedia Sad that the children in Amhara and Afar will not go to school this year after Tigray forces destroyed, looted and vandalized all the schools while they invaded those regions 3 months ago. Still attacking Afar at this very moment.

@TghatMedia The more than 15-months-old war was marked by extreme brutality, including the use of rape and hunger as weapons of war, massacres, and ethnic cleansing against Tigrayans. #TigrayGenocide #SupportHR6600

@TghatMedia People of Tigray have been ethnically cleansed, mass massacred, violently raped. Additionally, their infrastructure, factories, & institutions turned to dust. They were cut off from the rest of the world by systematic siege. #TigrayGenocide #SupportHR6600
